metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4207 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash component infrastructure in YUI 2.4.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla, Moodle, and other products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to charts/assets/charts.swf.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.2.2.dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: loggerhead: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.2.dfsg-2').
